metadata.name: A ray of hope on a pile of scrap metal
metadata.description:
Huge piles of scrap and scrap Some people tend to interpret it as trash that has no value, so it piles up and collects it up. Until one child realized that these irons were very valuable to him. He sat and looked at it and saw that there was a mulra in the form of light. Light is hope for him and that is what he will make it worth and he will have hope on this pile of trash. 1:1 
Size : 4000 x 2500 pix
